content: WEBSITE  TWITTER INSTAGRAM  TELEGRAM FACEBOOK YOUTUBE   Music NFT Platform - TheTopSpotOnline is positioned to show that Music NFTs are the future of the music industry. TheTopSpotOnline is positioned to show that Music NFTs are the future of the music industry. We have implemented a US Patent Pending process to create a metaverse economy around recording artists, their music, NFTs and Cryptocurrency.The Music NFT at TheTopSpotOnline promises to bring back the days of the intimate transaction between fan and artist. Bounty Related All questions: Group Here Channel HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Sunday/Monday Forum time); Otherwise you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsDear Bounty Hunters, We delightfully announcing the TheTopSpotOnline bounty program has been launched. TheTopSpotOnline Official Bounty Program in order to reward its supporters with SPOTT tokens. 6,000,000 in SPOTT Tokens will be allocated to the Bounty Pool. Create Nebl wallet from https://orion.nebl.io/ to receive tokenWeek 1 (18 Apr - 24 Apr).......... END Week 2 (25 Apr - 01 May).......... END Week 3 (02 May ¬†- 08 May).......... ENDBounty reward will be Divided below sections, üåç Section A: Twitter campaign (40%)üåç Section B: Instagram Campaign (30%)üåç Section C: Article Campaign (10%)üåç Section D: Youtube Campaign (10%)üåç Section E: Telegram Campaign (10%)Mandatory Rules‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group;‚ñ†Must join  Bounty telegram group  &  Channel;‚ñ†Must follow us on Twitter;‚ñ†Must follow us on Instagram;‚ñ†Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;‚ñ†Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;‚ñ†Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;‚ñ†We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;‚ñ†The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,‚ñ†Each Week will end Monday 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form‚ñ†Post a reply before join campaign‚ñ†Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostBitcointalk username: Telegram username: Which Campaign you joined: Wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Instagram Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Youtube Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Telegram Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Rules of Twitter Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Twitter page;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with #TheTopSpotOnline #SPOTT #Crypto;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Your Twitter account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Instagram Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Instagram ;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Share/likes/Comment 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with #TheTopSpotOnline #SPOTT #Crypto;‚ñ†Your Instagram account must be old 1 month;#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Youtube:‚ñ†Minimum 100 Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Subscriber must be public;‚ñ†Video minimum length 2 minutes;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word . And Use hashtag #TheTopSpotOnline #SPOTT #Crypto;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Instagram Link and also Telegram link;‚ñ†Maximum 4 video will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username, Email address in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 500-5000 (Extra 1 stakes)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)Rules of Article:‚ñ†Content Must be original;‚ñ†Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;‚ñ†The article must be up to 500 words;‚ñ†We don‚Äôt allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ‚ñ†Content must be in English‚ñ†Maximum 4 content will accept for one person;‚ñ†Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Instagram Link, also Telegram link;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username, Email address in Video DescriptionContent Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesRules of Telegram Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†Add our AVATAR and name ( "Your Name | TheTopSpotOnline Ambassador" ) - Mandatory;‚ñ†Positive message in TheTopSpotOnline Group 2 times every week;‚ñ†Post minimum 4 positive messages about TheTopSpotOnline to other Crypto Telegram groups;‚ñ†Do not spam into the telegram group, Do not use any hashtags;‚ñ†Do not use slag language in the telegram group;‚ñ†Submit your message link End of the week (Sunday/MondayForum time)Telegram Rewards#6 Stakes every week  SPREADSHEET / Participants List[N.B- Token distribution will be done by the team and Distribution will be done. I am the only bounty manager of this project. I am not responsible for the bad things about this project. I have the right to change any rules of this project.]
